title: Sri Lanka : Most of the 19 ‘Journalists’ killed were LTTE or killed by LTTE
content: – by Shenali D Waduge – The Committee for the Protection of Journalists – CPJ has released a list of 19 ‘journalists’ it claims to have been killed since 1992 in Sri Lanka. CPJ includes 39 journalists killed worldwide in 2013 – none reported in Sri Lanka since January 2009. In total 1007 journalists are…
